00010   // WARNING: This name MUST be unique across all plugins !
00011   $PG_current_class="ldapAuthPlugin";
00012 
00013   /* Main class */
00014   class ldapAuthPlugin {
00015     /* Variables */
00016                 private $connectionID;          //< Ldap connection resource identifier.
00017                 
00018     /* Contructor */
00019     function ldapAuthPlugin() {
00020       //echo "This is the constructor of ".get_class($this)."<br />\n";
00021 
00022                         // Load the config file !
00023                         require "config.php";
00024     }
00025 
00036     function validate($login, $password) {
00037       //echo "\$login : $login<br />\n";
00038       //echo "\$password : $password<br />\n";
00039                         
00040                         // Connect to the ldap server
00041                         $this->connectionID=ldap_connect($this->ldapServer);
00042 
00043                         // First, bind anonymously and retrieve the full DN corresponding to
00044                         // the login provided by the user, as well as the user name to display.
00045                         $success=ldap_bind($this->connectionID);
00046                         $searchString="(&(objectClass=person)($this->ldapSearchAttribute=$login))";
00047                         $result=ldap_search($this->connectionID, $this->ldapBase, $searchString, array("dn", $this->userNameAttribute));
00048                         $entries=ldap_get_entries($this->connectionID, $result);
00049 
00050                         // Keep only the first entry
00051                         $userFullDN=$entries[0]["dn"];
00052                         $userNameToDisplay=$entries[0]["$this->userNameAttribute"][0];
00053 
00054                         // If $userNameToDisplay retrievial failed, we won't authenticate, so
00055                         // set it to true to save things.
00056                         if (empty($userNameToDisplay))
00057                           $userNameToDisplay=true;
00058                         
00059                         // TODO GESTION D'ERREUR !
00060 
00061                         // Now we can authenticate : Bind to the ldap server
00062                         $success=ldap_bind($this->connectionID, $userFullDN, $password);
00063                         ldap_close($this->connectionID);
00064                         
00065                         // If bind was successful, then authentification succeeded too, and return
00066                         // the user name to display.
00067                         if ($success==true) {
00068                           return $userNameToDisplay;
00069                                 }
00070                   else {
00071         return false;
00072                         }
00073     }
00074 
00084     function disconnect(){
00085       return true;
00086     }
00087 
00099     function autoAuth() {
00100                         return false;
00101     }
00102   } // class ldapAuthPlugin
